signatures.text: fun <reified T : CVariable> NativePlacement.allocArray( length: Long): CArrayPointer<T>
signatures.desc: Allocates C array of given elements type and length.

signatures.text: inline fun <reified T : CVariable> NativePlacement.allocArray( length: Long, initializer: T.(index: Long) -> Unit): CArrayPointer<T>
signatures.desc: Allocates C array of given elements type and length, and initializes its elements applying given block.
